alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:56PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Traverse, Big Stone, Deuel, southeastern Roberts, eastern Hamlin, Grant and eastern Codington Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 756 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Barry to near Ortonville to near Bullhead Lake to near Stone Bridge. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ortonville, Big Stone City, Odessa, Barry and Siloah Country Church around 800 PM CDT. Graceville, Clinton, Revillo, Big Stone Colony and Collis around 805 PM CDT. Albee around 810 PM CDT. Artichoke, Correll, Johnson, Artichoke Lake and Trinity Lutheran Country Church around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Clear Lake, Toronto, Astoria, Brandt and Lake Cochrane Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Minnesota...and northeastern South Dakota.
